text: The men's lightweight quadruple sculls competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Monday 26 August 2019 || 11:47 || Heats |- | Tuesday 27 August 2019 || 11:41 || Repechage |- | rowspan=2|Friday 30 August 2019 || 10:32 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 15:36 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== Heat winners advanced directly to the final. The remaining boats were sent to the repechage. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Lorenzo Fontana Alfonso Scalzone Catello Amarante Gabriel Soares | align="left"| | 5:56.64 | FA |- | 2 | align="left"|Frederik Taulbjerg Jonas Lund Fredrik Leicht Christian Hagemann | align="left"| | 5:59.15 | R |- | 3 | align="left"|Paul Sieber Sebastian Kabas Bernhard Sieber Philipp Kellner | align="left"| | 6:01.54 | R |- | 4 | align="left"|Hugh Sutton Miles Taylor Ryan Ballantine Jacob McCarthy | align="left"| | 6:04.84 | R |} ====Heat 2==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Zhang Zhiyuan Chen Sensen Lü Fanpu Zeng Tao | align="left"| | 5:56.89 | FA |- | 2 | align="left"|Damion Eigenberg David Kampman Ward van Zeijl Bart Lukkes | align="left"| | 6:02.20 | R |- | 3 | align="left"|Leo Grandsire Benjamin David Thibault Colard Thomas Baroukh | align="left"| | 6:13.09 | R |- | 4 | align="left"|Zachary Heese Peter Schmidt Daniel Madden Jasper Liu | align="left"| | 6:20.63 | R |} ===Repechage=== The four fastest boats advanced to the A final. The remaining boats were sent to the B final. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Damion Eigenberg David Kampman Ward van Zeijl Bart Lukkes | align="left"| | 5:55.10 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Frederik Taulbjerg Jonas Lund Fredrik Leicht Christian Hagemann | align="left"| | 5:55.66 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 3 | align="left"|Sebastian Kabas Bernhard Sieber Philipp Kellner Paul Sieber | align="left"| | 5:55.96 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 4 | align="left"|Leo Grandsire Benjamin David Thibault Colard Thomas Baroukh | align="left"| | 5:57.47 | FA |- | 5 | align="left"|Hugh Sutton Miles Taylor Ryan Ballantine Jacob McCarthy | align="left"| | 5:58.99 | FB |- | 6 | align="left"|Zachary Heese Peter Schmidt Daniel Madden Jasper Liu | align="left"| | 5:59.25 | FB |} ===Finals=== The A final determined the rankings for places 1 to 6. Additional rankings were determined in the B final. ====Final B==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time |- | 1 | align="left"|Zachary Heese Peter Schmidt Daniel Madden Jasper Liu | align="left"| | 6:03.94 |- | 2 | align="left"|Hugh Sutton Miles Taylor Ryan Ballantine Jacob McCarthy | align="left"| | 6:06.62 |} ====Final A==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time |- | | align="left"|Zhang Zhiyuan Chen Sensen Lü Fanpu Zeng Tao | align="left"| | 5:53.63 |- | | align="left"|Lorenzo Fontana Alfonso Scalzone Catello Amarante Gabriel Soares | align="left"| | 5:55.01 |- | | align="left"|Damion Eigenberg David Kampman Ward van Zeijl Bart Lukkes | align="left"| | 5:56.06 |- | 4 | align="left"|Frederik Taulbjerg Jonas Lund Fredrik Leicht Christian Hagemann | align="left"| | 5:58.68 |- | 5 | align="left"|Sebastian Kabas Bernhard Sieber Philipp Kellner Paul Sieber | align="left"| | 5:58.79 |- | 6 | align="left"|Leo Grandsire Benjamin David Thibault Colard Thomas Baroukh | align="left"| | 5:58.79 |} ==References== Category:2019 World Rowing Championships
title: 2019 World Rowing Championships – Men's lightweight quadruple sculls
